xtiny-doc-page.name: Search Menu
xtiny-doc-page.title: Jext : Search Menu
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: The Search menu provides access to the search and replace features. Refer to the Search section for more information.

menu.title: Contents
menu.item: Displays the Jext find dialog box. This dialog box can be used to enter a search pattern, set search options and start a search. Some components are grayed out (disabled) because they are meaningful to the Replace feature only.
Displays the same dialog as the Find option, but enables components which were disabled in Find feature.
Displays the Find All dialog which provides same options as Find feature but displays all matches in a list.
Searches for the next occurence of the previous pattern used for a search. The previous pattern persists from one Jext session to the next.
Replaces the next occurence of previous search pattern with the previous replacement pattern.
Replaces the current selection in the text area with the previous replacement pattern.
